CodeBlockMethod.Name: feverUI_Control
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end local int = math.floor(num) if int == 0 then self.Gage1.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.red elseif int == 1 then self.Gage2.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.red elseif int == 2 then self.Gage3.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.red elseif int == 3 then self.Gage4.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.red elseif int == 4 then self.Gage5.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.red self.Fever.Enable = true self.V.Enable = true end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: feverUI_End
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.Gage1.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white self.Gage2.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white self.Gage3.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white self.Gage4.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white self.Gage5.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.white self.Fever.Enable = false self.V.Enable = false

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleDeadEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters -------------------------------------------------------- self:feverUI_Control(self.dead_num) self.dead_num = self.dead_num + 1 if(self.dead_num > 4.9) then self.fever_able = true end
